Pizza.name: Margherita
Pizza.recipe: Combine pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves to make a simple, yet delicious Margherita pizza.

Pizza.name: Pepperoni
Pizza.recipe: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, top with pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese, then bake until golden and bubbly to make a simple Pepperoni pizza.

Pizza.name: Hawaiian
Pizza.recipe: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, top with ham, pineapple chunks, and mozzarella cheese, then bake until golden and melty to make a simple Hawaiian pizza.

Pizza.name: Veggie Pizza
Pizza.recipe: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, top with a variety of fresh vegetables such as bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives, along with mozzarella cheese, then bake until the crust is crispy and the cheese is melted for a simple Veggie pizza.

Pizza.name: Chicken
Pizza.recipe: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, top with cooked chicken, red onions, bell peppers, and mozzarella cheese, then bake until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted for a simple Chicken pizza.
